project.name: Copilot Agent Team Improvements
project.description: Comprehensive copilot improvements identified by 4-agent analysis team: Output Formatting, UX/UI & Loading, Skills Enhancement, and Skeptic Critique. Targets autonomous mode parity, skill routing reliability, and UX polish.

features.name: Autonomous Mode Data & Response Parity
features.description: Wire autonomous mode to real CRM data and structured responses. Currently the default mode asks Claude to hallucinate data.

features.name: Skill Routing & Trigger Fix
features.description: Rewrite all 31 skill triggers from event names to natural language V2 format. Tiers 1 & 2 of routing are currently non-functional.

features.name: UX Essential Fixes
features.description: Retry button, copy button, scroll-to-bottom, unified input, keyboard shortcuts.

features.name: Output Formatting Consistency
features.description: Centralize formatting utilities, standardize components, fix action contract.

features.name: Skills Coverage Expansion
features.description: Build missing skills (lead research, competitive intel, qualification, win/loss) and sequences.

features.name: Code Quality & Tech Debt
features.description: Split 14k-line edge function, remove dead code, fix memory service bug, clean bundle.
